title: A long time ago, my "B" key broke
body: What happened afterward, I can't recall.

My D key broke before when I had to replace my keyboard, I had to put flash on G.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
excuse me sir, you seem to be mistaken.  flash is in the F key, not the D key.

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2Z8hXPNA,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-06-27T10:25:38.895+0000)
>
> excuse me sir, you seem to be mistaken.  flash is in the F key, not the D key.

I use flash on the D key...
https://media.giphy.com/media/ceeN6U57leAhi/giphy.gif
Dr. Cox would use flash on D
same

Some people like to Flash their D.
Don't judge.

I don't get it. When you start the game, you get Ghost on D and Heal on F. 

The game immediately gives you a mobility spell on D, and a utility on F.

When you get Exhaust, Tele, Ignite or Smite, you naturally replace heal. Finally, you replace ghost with flash at level 10, which is still on D.

I don't get it
http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Flash

Its also closer to your fingers

More op spell should be closer
.....my flash in on my R key.
{{champion:90}} "We aren't talking about you Kassadin!"
Thats malzahar my dude --- think you wanted this one: {{champion:38}}
((it was malz talking to kass I think))
I used to use flash on f until i realized that it just makes flash ulting harder. It really is most optimally used on d in the standard key set up.
thats what we call hard mode
I bound my flash to ALT + F4 cause flash is for cowards
My flash is on 9

D is for Damage.
F is for Flash.

actually clicking on the button doesnt work unless it was fixed.
It works, but there's an option to disable casting spells by clicking on them (save you from accidently clicking on your HUD) which will prevent it.

> [{quoted}](name=notice me Sin pi,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2Z8hXPNA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-06-27T07:38:14.172+0000)
>
> meme is invalid 
> http://imgur.com/OYgLWJZ

What happened? I can't see.{{champion:64}}

He is pointing out that even if your B key is broken, you can just click on the icon to recall.
Therefore "I can't recall" is invalid, because he actually can even without the B key.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2Z8hXPNA,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2017-06-27T09:02:52.674+0000)
>
> He is pointing out that even if your B key is broken, you can just click on the icon to recall.
> Therefore "I can't recall" is invalid, because he actually can even without the B key.

He's saying...

"I can't recall?!?"

Meaning, he can't remember what happened, and the B key is the recall button.
I get the joke, just was explaining what the other guy meant by "invalid".
https://i.makeagif.com/media/12-18-2015/Q1tLsy.gif?noredirect

Why did it break in the first place? Is it ->(-B-)<-cause you rage?

....Sometimes I think I try to hard
D is for (Teleport) F is for [ Flash] .

~F is for Flash because it just makes sense, yours is on the wrong key~
~D is the place you put every other spell whenever you're playing League~
